page.title: 18SCHOOL 4 A PUPIL'S DAY
page.content: {7.30}Wake up very dreary eyed.Weetab ix for breakfast{8.00}Getting dressed a bit late{8.20}Brush teeth.Get a poet ry book.Brush hair.Get my cello & coat.Put cello in car-hard work.Bumpy ride to school{8.35}In playground.Put cello in Blue Room{8.56}5 minute bell goes.Into school-get pushed over{9.01 Line up for assembly-boring{9.25}Out of assembly thank goodness.{9.30}Try to write a poem{10.30}It's raining-wet play time.Saw lightning{10.50}Time for cello lesson{11.25}Go to the hall with Mr Sherlock{12.00}Lunchtime.Line up-st arving{12.50}Out of the hall into the playground{1.15}Come in from play.Reg gister is called{1.30}Go to Mr Palmer for topic{3.19}Hometime-my favourite time{3.47}Switch on television{6.30 Arrive at cubs,my favourite hobby {8.00}Home{9.30}Just going to sleep. Damian Ashfield 10. Pines Junior Sch.
